^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've taught yourself some basic electronics and can now make a variety of rudimentary wired machinery at your ^orange;Tinkering Table.^reset;

^orange;Tier 2^reset;

The free energy of stars is now within your reach with your understanding of solar technology. You can now build solar panels at your ^orange;Electronics Center^reset;.

^orange;Tier 2^reset;

Using Item Networks, you can automate a huge number of processes and improve your quality of life dramatically. Researching Item Utilities will give you access to a laundry list of useful utility objects at your ^orange;Electronics Center^reset;.

^orange;Tier 2^reset;

Using silicon, you've learned to create simple solid-state batteries at your ^orange;Electronics Center^reset;- a big step up from junky old lead-acid ones.

^orange;Tier 2^reset;

With Tungsten, you can now build a big, bulky centrifuge that more efficiently processes liquids and can also recieve external attachments to jar honey. Build one at your ^orange;Electronics Center^reset;.

^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've designed a device that will condense the atmosphere into liquid when powered. What liquid is produced depends on the planet.

^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've improved upon your fossil-fuel-burner design. With a Combustion Engine, you can generate more power than an Alternator using a wider array of fuel types.

^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned to upgrade your copper pumps and quarries into iron versions, which work more quickly.

^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Experimentation with heat-resistant alloys have lead to your creation of a powerful electric Blast Furnace which more efficiently smelts your ores.

^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Having improved upon your Sifter design, you can now harvest the hidden treasures of blocks much more efficiently. You can also create a Rock Crusher, which breaks up hard materials like cobblestone and conglomerate instead of sands and silts.

^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Mixing liquids can have many beneficial effects, especially now that you designed a machine to do just that. The liquid mixer can not only produce liquid reactions quickly and cleanly, but also allows for some reactions that couldn't happen when mixing liquid manually.

^orange;Tier 3^reset;

With access to more durable metals like Titanium, you've developed a durable wind turbine which will generate lots of renewable energy in the right environment.

^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've designed a crafting table for creating logic gates, sensors, traps and other large-scale wiring objects.

^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've developed a sleek new centrifuge that is better at its job than before thanks to the power of Protocite processing.

^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've gotten a hang of nuclear fission, and can now build Fission Reactors that not only provide tons of power, but also generate useful fission by-products. Just mind the radiation.

^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've improved upon your condenser design to create a much more potent device which will condense many useful reagants and elements in addition to liquids.

^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've improved your skills building batteries with silicon, and can now create batteries that hold much more charge than before.

^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to upgrade your iron pumps and quarries into titanium versions, which work more quickly still.

^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to use graphene to enhance your solar panels, allowing you to build bigger and more efficient solar arrays.

^orange;Tier 4^reset;

By combining nanofibre and Quietus metals, you can create incredibly potent solar towers which harvest vast amounts of renewable energy.

^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Using Protocite's amazing ability to store and channel energy, you've designed a new kind of battery that is better than silicon in every way.

^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Using advanced metals and machinery, you've created an automatic manufacturer which can be configured to quickly craft any item or object you want when provided with materials.

^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Using your knowledge of atmospheric mechanics, you've designed a device which filters the air and regulates temperature, providing protection against many hazards while nearby.

^orange;Tier 4^reset;

With AI technology, you've designed a centrifuge that is so efficient and capable that it can even process radioactive isotopes into exciting new forms.

^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've learned to upgrade your titanium pumps and quarries into Densinium versions, which work extremely quickly.

^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've put your wiring expertise to work, and can now create many autonomous turrets for defense or automation.

^orange;Tier 5^reset;

By applying your knowledge of medicine to electronics, you've created a field generator that rapidly heals everything within a wide radius.

^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Combining AI technology and Quietus metals, you have developed a bizarre sort of battery that stores energy almost like a living creature. This comes with even better storage capacity.

^orange;Tier 5^reset;

The interstellar ansible internet is a bustling and lucrative place to be, and now you can access it with your newly devised machine.

^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Generating electricity from quantum mechanics is something very few people have done, but you can count yourself among them with your new Quantum Reactor. Capable of burning both traditional and esoteric fuels, it generates unfathomably large amounts of power.

^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Liquid Metallic Hydrogen is such a potent energy medium that it blows any solid-state battery out of the water. With it, you've designed what may well be the best battery in the galaxy.

^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Not satisfied with traditional extraction machines, you've improved on the design with quantum mechanics. Quantum Extractors not only work faster than ever, but produce twice as much from their extractions.

^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Using your newfound quantum knowledge, you've designed an incredibly powerful electric furnace that smelts even more efficiently and quickly than a blast furnace, but can also perform quantum conversions by pressurizing its contents to levels that surpass gas giants.

^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You've mastered atmospheric cleansing. With the Atmospheric Regulator, there is no place you can't settle - butt-naked, if you so choose.
